About me

Let me tell you a few things

BIO

I'm a fourth-year student of BSUIR who's also interested in web-development.
I'm mostly а Front End Developer with one year of commercial experience in Angular Framework.
I'm really keen on using up to date best practices and I'm a true fan of static analysis tools (ES/Tslint, Sasslint, Prettier) and semantic layouts with HTML5/CSS3(Sass).
I'm an advanced English user with FCE (Grade A) certificate for confirmation.

At the moment I'm working for IDT Corporation.
